org.openimaj.feature

Class SparseLongFV

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.feature.SparseLongFV
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, FeatureVector, org.openimaj.io.Readable, org.openimaj.io.ReadableASCII, org.openimaj.io.ReadableBinary, org.openimaj.io.ReadWriteable, org.openimaj.io.Writeable, org.openimaj.io.WriteableASCII, org.openimaj.io.WriteableBinary, org.openimaj.util.concatenate.Concatenatable<SparseLongFV,SparseLongFV>

    public class SparseLongFV
extends Object
implements FeatureVector, org.openimaj.util.concatenate.Concatenatable<SparseLongFV,SparseLongFV>
    A sparse one-dimensional feature vector of long-valued elements.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public DoubleFV normaliseFV(double[] min,
                   double[] max)
        Description copied from interface: FeatureVector
        Element-wise normalisation to 0..1 using separated expected minimum and maximum values for each element of the underlying feature vector.
        Specified by:
        normaliseFV in interface FeatureVector
        Parameters:
        min - an array containing the minimum expected values
        max - an array containing the maximum expected values
        Returns:
        copy of the feature vector with each value normalised to 0..1

      • normaliseFV

        public DoubleFV normaliseFV(double min,
                   double max)
        Description copied from interface: FeatureVector
        Min-Max normalisation of the FV. Each element of the underlying feature vector is normalised to 0..1 based on the provided minimum and maximum expected values.
        Specified by:
        normaliseFV in interface FeatureVector
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum expected value
        max - the maximum expected value
        Returns:
        copy of the feature vector with each value normalised to 0..1
